ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bard sit in scheduled
ygData.msgSnippet: What exactly prompted this strike?  I mean, I know about all (or very nearly all) the nerfs we ve gotten.  So I m not looking for a full detailed history
ygData.messageBody:
What exactly prompted this strike? I mean, I know about all (or very
nearly all) the nerfs we've gotten. So I'm not looking for a full detailed
history beginning in beta 2 or anything like that. I'm just wondering what
the last straw was. I think I missed that while I was away from EQ and
this list for about a month.

Thanks.

Evulia, who hasn't gotten out in almost 2 months simply because I've been
having more fun with the rogue, Tunare
